channel.title: Tehpk-Scape 718/742 | Born To Play | Where Noobs Become Legends | Check it out!
channel.description:
[center]Hello Guys I Was Hosting 317 revision , but it's kinda waste of time , 317 is nothing seriously. ----- ~Our Website~: [url=http://tehpk-scape.tk/]http://tehpk-scape.tk/[/url] ----- And Today I Started Hosting 718/742. ----- NOTE: Staff Needed + Website Maker. ----- The Download Links For The Client , Will Be Down. ----- Join Us And Give Us A Check :). ----- [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5128968/serverpicture.png[/img] ----- Features: Prestiging - 10 prestige levels , We Are Working On The Shop Now. Loyalty System w/shop Wings all work Squeal of Fortune 99% Money Pouch clue Scrolls File Implemented but not finished Grotworms Dungeon Polypore Dungeon Level Points with shop The ability to click a skill and either open a shop or teleport to the training location. Clan Wars all portals 100% Character Design Troll Invasion minigame Zombies Minigame Working Runespan - glitchy all skill trainable Player Owned Homes - with the ability to make objects, they dont show up but you can train construction by continuously remaking stuff Sawmill operator 100% all working curses Completionists cape stand working Torva/Pernix/Virtus degrade and can be repaired Quest system added Commands file tweaked/fixed ::sellall command Over 1500 NPCs Spawned all skill interfaces fixed Teleport Crystal Working Hunter Pking is near perfected Donator zone Extreme Donator Zone Halfway done Lots more cant remember it all.... + all matrix features Pk/skill ECO Shops perfected Lucky Items and their special attacks/stats
Npc's
King Black Dragon (737 one) Queen Black Dragon Tormented Demons with all prayers and attacks Nex Full Godwars Dungeon, with teleports and working altars ( with timers ) Corporeal beast Frost dragons Dominion Tower Glacors Nomads Requim Bork The Inadequancy The Illusive Kalphite Queen All stages and attacks + more. -------------- Pictures: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5128931/home.jpg[/img] -------------- [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5128932/95565752.jpg[/img] -------------- [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5128935/85823651.jpg[/img] -------------- [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5128944/43325173.jpg[/img] -------------- [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5128949/26944228.jpg[/img] -------------- [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5128954/runespan.jpg[/img] -------------- [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5128956/88199329.jpg[/img] -------------- [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5128961/34411562.jpg[/img] -------------- Download Links: [url=http://uppit.com/brcjfzs6yjfw/Tehpk-Scape.jar]Download Tehpk.Scape.jar @ UppIT[/url] Short Link: [url=http://upx.nz/GwpMKH]Download Tehpk.Scape.jar @ UppIT[/url] -------------- Hope You Guys Give Us A check :)! -------------- Have A Nice Day Guys, ~Tehpk~[/center]

item.title: Tehpk-Scape 718/742 | Born To Play | Where Noobs Become Legends | Check it out!
item.dc:creator: @kuwaityyy kuwaityyy
item.description:
@kuwaityyy wrote:

[center]Hello Guys I Was Hosting 317 revision , but it’s kinda waste of time , 317 is nothing seriously.

~Our Website~: http://tehpk-scape.tk/

And Today I Started Hosting 718/742.

NOTE: Staff Needed + Website Maker.

The Download Links For The Client , Will Be Down.

Join Us And Give Us A Check :).

Features:
Prestiging - 10 prestige levels , We Are Working On The Shop Now.
Loyalty System w/shop
Wings all work
Squeal of Fortune
99% Money Pouch
clue Scrolls File Implemented but not finished
Grotworms Dungeon
Polypore Dungeon
Level Points with shop
The ability to click a skill and either open a shop or teleport to the training location.
Clan Wars all portals
100% Character Design
Troll Invasion minigame
Zombies Minigame
Working Runespan - glitchy
all skill trainable
Player Owned Homes - with the ability to make objects, they dont show up but you can train construction by continuously remaking stuff
Sawmill operator 100%
all working curses
Completionists cape stand working
Torva/Pernix/Virtus degrade and can be repaired
Quest system added
Commands file tweaked/fixed
::sellall command
Over 1500 NPCs Spawned
all skill interfaces fixed
Teleport Crystal
Working Hunter
Pking is near perfected
Donator zone
Extreme Donator Zone Halfway done
Lots more cant remember it all…

  • all matrix features
    Pk/skill ECO
    Shops perfected
    Lucky Items and their special attacks/stats

Npc’s

King Black Dragon (737 one)
Queen Black Dragon
Tormented Demons with all prayers and attacks
Nex
Full Godwars Dungeon, with teleports and working altars ( with timers )
Corporeal beast
Frost dragons
Dominion Tower
Glacors
Nomads Requim
Bork
The Inadequancy
The Illusive
Kalphite Queen All stages and attacks

  • more.

Pictures:

Download Links: Download Tehpk.Scape.jar @ UppIT

Hope You Guys Give Us A check :)!

Have A Nice Day Guys, ~Tehpk~[/center]
